text: From Hell is a 2001 American Czech period horror thriller movie directed by The Hughes Brothers and was based on the graphic novel of the same name by Alan Moore and Eddie Campbell. It stars Johnny Depp, Heather Graham, Ian Holm, Ian Richardson, Robbie Coltrane, Jason Flemyng, Annabelle Apsion, Lesley Sharp, Susan Lynch, Paul Rhys, Ian McNeice, David Schofield, Bruce Byron and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:2001 horror movies Category:2001 thriller movies Category:2000s horror thriller movies Category:2000s serial killer movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:American serial killer movies Category:Czech horror movies Category:Czech thriller movies Category:Movies set in the 1880s Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Albert Hughes Category:Movies directed by Allen Hughes Category:Movies set in London Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: From Hell (movie)
